properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get your company's ProfitWell account settings

properties.name: type
properties.description: Retrieve financial metric broken down by day for either the current month or the last

properties.name: Monthly
properties.description: Retrieve all monthly financial metric for your company

properties.name: month
properties.description: Can only be the current or previous month. Format should be YYYY-MM.

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Only return the metric for this Plan ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: dailyMetrics
properties.description: Number of paying customers

properties.name: Churned Customers
properties.description: Number of paying customers who churned

properties.name: Churned Recurring Revenue
properties.description: MRR lost to churn (voluntary and delinquent)

properties.name: Cumulative Net New MRR
properties.description: New + Upgrades - Downgrades - Churn MRR, cumulative for the month up through the given day

properties.name: Cumulative New Trialing Customers
properties.description: Number of new trialing customers, cumulative for the month up through the given day

properties.name: Downgraded Customers
properties.description: Number of existing customers who net downgraded

properties.name: Downgraded Recurring Revenue
properties.description: How much downgrades and plan length decreases affect your MRR

properties.name: Future Churn MRR
properties.description: MRR that will be lost when users who are currently cancelled actually churn

properties.name: New Customers
properties.description: Number of new, paying customers you have

properties.name: New Recurring Revenue
properties.description: MRR from new users

properties.name: Reactivated Customers
properties.description: Number of customers who have reactivated

properties.name: Reactivated Recurring Revenue
properties.description: How much MRR comes from reactivated customers

properties.name: Recurring Revenue
properties.description: Your company's MRR

properties.name: Upgraded Customers
properties.description: Number of existing customers who net upgraded

properties.name: Upgraded Recurring Revenue
properties.description: How much upgrades and plan length increases affect your MRR

properties.name: monthlyMetrics
properties.description: Number of paying customers

properties.name: Active Trialing Customers
properties.description: Number of trialing customers

properties.name: Average Revenue Per User
properties.description: ARPU

properties.name: Churned Customers Cancellations
properties.description: Number of customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

properties.name: Churned Customers Delinquent
properties.description: Number of customers who churned because they failed to pay you

properties.name: Churned Recurring Revenue Cancellations
properties.description: Revenue lost to customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

properties.name: Churned Recurring Revenue Delinquent
properties.description: Revenue lost to customers who churned delinquent

properties.name: Churned Trialing Customers
properties.description: Number of trialling customers who churned

properties.name: Converted Customers
properties.description: Number of customers who converted from trialing to active

properties.name: Converted Recurring Revenue
properties.description: How much MRR comes from users who converted from trialing to active

properties.name: Customer Churn Cancellations Rate
properties.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned by cancelling their subscription(s)

properties.name: Customer Churn Delinquent Rate
properties.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned because they failed to pay you

properties.name: Customer Churn Rate
properties.description: Percentage of paying customers who churned

properties.name: Customer Conversion Rate
properties.description: Percent of trialing customers who converted

properties.name: Customer Retention Rate
properties.description: Percent of customers active last month who are still active this month

properties.name: Downgrade Customers
properties.description: Number of existing customers who net downgraded

properties.name: Downgrade Rate
properties.description: Downgrade revenue as a percent of existing revenue

properties.name: Downgrade Recurring Revenue
properties.description: How much downgrades and plan length decreases affect your MRR

properties.name: Existing Customers
properties.description: Number of paying customers you had at the start of the given month

properties.name: Existing Recurring Revenue
properties.description: Your company's MRR at the start of the given month

properties.name: Existing Trialing Customers
properties.description: Number of trialing customers who existed at the start of the month

properties.name: Growth_Rate
properties.description: Rate at which your company's MRR has grown over the previous month

properties.name: Lifetime Value
properties.description: Average LTV, as calculated at the end of the given period

properties.name: New Trailing Customers
properties.description: Number of new trialing customers

properties.name: Plan Changed Rate
properties.description: Net change in revenue as a percentage of existing revenue

properties.name: Plan Changed Recurring Revenue
properties.description: Net change in revenue for this plan

properties.name: Revenue Churn Cancellations Rate
properties.description: Voluntary churn revenue as a percent of the month's starting revenue

properties.name: Revenue Churn Delinquent_ Rate
properties.description: Delinquent churn revenue as a percent of the month's starting revenue

properties.name: Revenue Churn Rate
properties.description: Revenue lost to churn as a percentage of existing revenue

properties.name: Revenue Retention Rate
properties.description: Percent of revenue coming from existing customers that was retained by the end of the month

properties.name: Upgrade Rate
properties.description: Upgrade revenue as a percent of existing revenue
